page.title: 10A FARMER IN SCREDINGTON.
page.content: Mr Fox is a local farmer.He farms about 130 acres of land with his brother David.Most of the land is used for growing crops but he has 4 bullocks in a paddock by the house.Hay is grown for his own stock and the surplus is sold.Other crops grown are grain ,sugar beet,beans and oil seed rape.He gets up about 5.30 and returns home for breakfast at 9.30.Followed by a quick visit each day to his elderly mother who is 92 he works again until 12.30 has dinner and goes back to work.This means tractor driving,constructing new buildings, hay making etc. After tea he works in the garden watches a favourite TV programme and goes to bed early.
